# Greater Penetrating Strike (Feat)
## Overview
Your attacks penetrate the defenses of most foes. Choose a weapon that you have selected for [[Penetrating Strike (Feat)|Penetrating Strike]].

**Prerequisites**: [[Penetrating Strike (Feat)|Penetrating Strike]], [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]], 16th-level fighter.

**Benefit**: Your attacks with the selected weapon ignore up to 10 points of damage reduction. This amount is reduced to 5 points for damage reduction without a type (such as DR 10/â€”).

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 125
